articles.title: Britain seeks extra AstraZeneca shots to combat 'beta' COVID-19 variant - The Star Online
articles.description: LONDON (Reuters) -     Britain is in talks with Oxford and AstraZeneca for additional doses of their COVID-19 vaccine that has been modified to better target the "beta" coronavirus variant first identified in South Africa, and it will fund trials of the shots.

articles.title: Sale of Burger King South Africa blocked over lack of black ownership - News24
articles.description: The Competition Commission has prohibited a proposed takeover of Burger King in South Africa.
articles.content:
• The Competition Commission has prohibited a proposed takeover of Burger King in South Africa.
  • It objected to the lack of historically disadvantaged persons among the new owners.
